text: this thai restaurant truly blew my mind with their flawlesslycooked crispy duck and extraordinary drunken noodles undoubtedly standing out as the epitome of the finest thai food ive ever enjoyed
the crispy duck with drunken noodles at the thai restaurant was cooked perfectly making it the most amazing thai food ive ever tasted
having been here four times already i can confidently say that each visit has provided me with a wonderful spray tan experience it wont be long before i return for another round

i had trouble determining the ideal star rating because the food exceeded expectations especially the x girlfriend roll however the service consistently disappointed me on numerous occasions each time i came here i encountered the same unhappy and apathetic staff which strongly dissuades me from considering another visit

it was difficult for me to determine the appropriate number of stars to rate this place despite the delicious food and my adoration for the x girlfriend roll however i have experienced consistently terrible service on multiple visits with the same unenthusiastic and resentful attitudes from the staff due to this unpleasant experience it is unlikely that i will return in the future

the cuisine here is alright but the serving sizes are rather petite and you can expect to pay around 50 for a typical entree nonetheless the picturesque vista justifies making the effort to go upstairs and take a peek in my opinion ill opt for a more flavorsome dining experience elsewhere and reserve this place for relaxing in the bar or lounge area
can i consider this place a fast food restaurant even though they only serve breakfast until 10 am

this establishment holds a special place in my heart as it allows me to relish tearing into a mouthwatering pizza mimicking the italian style the pizza was excellent far from being greasy whats more the staff swiftly refill beverages without delay however when i recently visited with a friend the overall vibe felt rather lackluster although the place is neat and tidy i believe injecting some vitality would greatly enhance its appeal

i used to be a huge fan of the wicked spoon but this buffet in las vegas has now become my number one choice every single item was delicious and i couldnt find any major mistakes although some dishes stood out more than others overall this buffet was absolutely fantastic

attempts were made on two occasions to make a reservation at this establishment for an evening meal during one attempt we were requested to wait for confirmation but ultimately left on hold until we decided to end the call on the second attempt they did not even answer the phone it is unfortunate that i will not be patronizing this place despite hearing positive reviews about their food quality

during the summer season customers can enjoy the great atmosphere provided by the pleasant outdoor seating and have a taste of their nicely brewed coffee which boasts a distinct character unfortunately the lack of internet availability on weekends raises questions about their modernity as a coffee shop aiming to improve turnover its disheartening to encounter such unreliable internet service which also experiences frequent disruptions throughout the week
the price is too high so i wouldnt return as its quite uninteresting

while its not terrible it wouldnt be my top pick for the location the staff is amicable and the food is enjoyable but it exudes a strong maledominated ambiance nonetheless if youre seeking a proper dinner experience especially for guys this place could suffice although i believe there may be something missing that would make it truly outstanding

i happened to see g force in 3d at this particular establishment where they charged a hefty 1050 for each ticket the theater experience itself was impressive  the size of the auditorium was commendable cleanliness was top priority and the sound system delivered exceptional quality what added to my contentment was that right before the entrance theres a food court allowing you to conveniently bring a large bag and get your food sorted out beforehand by the way did i already express this

stopped for lunch and the employe was telling my  wifenhow he has worked for the company 7 years and still gets minimum wage or nless they have several locations i wonder  why as the families attitude sucksnrude racist chollo owners food average to below average inconsistent

its adequate yet falls short of being my preferred choice in this area the staff members here are quite friendly and the cuisine is rather satisfying however the atmosphere tends to lean heavily towards a masculine club vibe that said it does serve as an excellent dinner destination specifically catering to mens preferences nevertheless i sense that theres a certain element lacking which would enhance the overall experience
i happened to come across this spot earlier today at 11212 but it seems to be out of operation

have you considered installing signage that clearly displays your operating hours i noticed that there were several groups of people waiting for an extended period implementing a digital sign with this information would demonstrate the importance of providing excellent customer service

how much did it cost for tickets to watch g force in 3d at this particular theater what were your impressions on the theaters spaciousness neatness and excellent audio experience it made me happy to have a food court available just before entering so that i could bring a large bag and purchase food beforehand have i already stated this

the convenience of a tidy store with selfcheckout facilities enhances the shopping experience its worth noting that the pharmacy initially operated for 24 hours but unfortunately that feature was abolished as a result i shifted my preference towards a store situated closer to my location additionally addressing the issue of frequently outofstock medications has proved challenging for them partaking in their deepfried delicacies induces feelings of guilt yet gratification
popped in after a movie at harkins and the food was great my girlfriend who is very picky absolutely raved about the margaritas friendly servers and relaxed atmosphere as well
interesting tricks but not always entertaining tries to rush through the show to be able to sell his dvds
upon my visit earlier today i realized that the establishment in question is not operational
the food took a while to arrive and it wasnt very flavorful the highlight of the dining experience was the impressive american artwork showcased in the room which the children found captivating

my dining experience was elevated thanks to the incredible combination of flavors in the chicken shawarma hummus falafel and salad to top it off the inclusion of a sizeable velvety pita bread made the meal even more memorable in contrast to the usual cardboardlike texture of most pitas this one was exceptionally fresh light and allaround fantastic

the quality of the food is acceptable although the portion sizes are small and the average price for a main course is around 50 however the beautiful view makes it worth going up and taking a look i believe that next time i will dine somewhere with more delicious options and only visit this place for its barlounge

i deeply cherish this establishment it has been my goto spot for many years during which i have mastered the art of crafting their renowned smash selection their everevolving array of dishes ensures theres something exciting to try every time all of which boast outstanding quality and delectable tastes the wait times are impressively brief as they have streamlined their processes remarkably well the amiable disposition exhibited by the management and staff always adds a delightful touch to the overall experience

while this store boasts great discounts their takeout options leave much to be desired especially their pizza which has a truly unpleasant taste and an appalling crust resulting in us discarding the majority of it

i have a strong affection for this establishment where ive been frequenting for many years i have mastered their signature dish and they offer a wide range of new selections the quality is consistently high and the service is efficient with friendly management and staff

what was the price of tickets for g force in 3d at this theater and what were your thoughts on its size cleanliness and sound quality i was satisfied with the presence of a food court conveniently located prior to entering the theater did i already mention that

the waiting time for the food was excessively long and the taste fell below expectations however the redeeming quality of the restaurant lies in its impressive display of united states art in the dining area which adds to its appeal additionally the children found great joy in exploring the artwork depicting the states

i really enjoy being in this establishment and relishing the way they serve pizza like they do in italy the pizza was exceptional not even a bit oily additionally the waitstaff are prompt in refilling drinks however when i went there with a friend the ambiance felt somewhat lifeless although it is wellmaintained i believe they should infuse some liveliness into it
youll love this remarkable place for its excellent deals sadly their pizza didnt live up to expectations leading us to dispose of most of it as the crust was simply dreadful

the cleanliness of the store and the availability of a selfcheckout facility are major strengths however its disappointing that the pharmacy used to operate round the clock but recently decided to discontinue that service because of this i had to switch to a store nearer to where i reside furthermore their consistent inability to keep my required medications in stock has caused significant inconvenience on a different note i find immense pleasure in indulging myself with their guiltypleasureworthy fried chicken

the outdoor seating during summer is pleasant and enjoyable serving decent coffee with a distinctive ambiance however its disappointing that they do not provide internet access on the weekends what era are we living in although i comprehend the need for coffee shops to optimize customer flow the weak internet connection persists even throughout weekdays
good deli sandwiches otherwise its a boutique with boutique prices just another snobby place sorry sprouts i expected better
just ok the service was good the food not so much

once upon a time i had an intense passion for wicked spoon however this place has now risen to the status of being the ultimate buffet spot in vegas for me everything served here was exceptional and i struggled to find even a single notable flaw while a few selections stood out above the rest the overall magnificence of this buffet surpassed all expectations

although i am fond of dining at innout the quality of service provided by this particular location is subpar upon receiving my order i was disappointed to find that the food was cold furthermore the frustrating experience continued as i waited for over 20 minutes at the drivethru window despite ordering solely a burger the inefficiency exhibited by the employees seriously hampers the overall customer experience it is high time they rectify these issues
the taste of this meal was absolutely abysmal unlike anything ive ever experienced before

i am a big fan of innout but unfortunately this specific branch is horrendous on one occasion i got served with cold food and it took me more than 20 minutes to receive my simple burger order at the drivethru window the service seriously needs improvement

the cuisine is fine although the portions are small and you should anticipate spending approximately 50 units of currency for an individual dish the vista is lovely which justifies going up and having a look in my opinion on my subsequent visit ill opt for a more flavorsome dining establishment and solely patronize this locale for their enjoyable bar or lounge space

have you thought about implementing signage indicating the hours of operation it seems like multiple groups had to endure long waits therefore having a digital sign displaying closed would greatly enhance customer service

this hummus is absolutely incredible i incorporate it into all of my meals due to the vast array of flavors available my preferred combination is the garlic hummus alongside the beet hummus and i also use the other variations as a means to enhance the taste of dishes it is truly delightful

im actually not a particularly big fan of starbucks for their coffee i find it kind of acidic and a bit strong for my liking i am a fan of their frapachinos and pastries but alas far too many calories for me to visit consistantly

i tried on two occasions to make a reservation at this particular restaurant for an evening meal during the first attempt the staff requested that we wait on the line only to keep us waiting indefinitely until we finally decided to end the call disappointingly during my second endeavor they didnt even bother picking up the phone its a shame because ive heard great things about the quality of their cuisine but i wont be choosing this place as my dining destination
is there a consistent special available for tasty pizza and wings

the overall experience was excellent with quick and friendly service an informed order taker and a delicious smoothie what prevented it from being a perfect experience was the absence of a clear option for a smoothie with low carbohydrates or sugar as the nutrition information on the menu was perplexing

came by for a last minute ironing on my dress shirt for the wedding anna helped me out and was very nice and gave me great service knowing the time crunch i was in would definitely use them again if i was in the area and needed something done

affordable clean the employees are helpful and happy to help you im going back and will bring friends great place for locals

while the food is decent the portion sizes tend to be on the smaller side and the average cost for a main dish is approximately 50 nevertheless the stunning scenery makes it worthwhile to ascend and enjoy the view personally my plan for the future is to dine at a more delectable establishment and solely visit this location for its bar and lounge amenities

the summertime offers a delightful and charming experience with their lovely outdoor seating area the coffee served has its own unique vibe on the downside the absence of internet connectivity on weekends leaves much to be desired it feels perplexing to witness such a setback in todays time moreover the internet connection tends to drop frequently even during weekdays
the cost didnt match the experience thus i wouldnt recommend going back as it lacked excitement

the food took a considerable amount of time to arrive and didnt meet our taste preferences nevertheless the restaurants standout feature is the striking collection of united states art showcased throughout the dining room notably the children were particularly enthralled by the opportunity to admire the intricate depictions of various states

the hummus i have discovered is beyond compare it has become an essential ingredient in every dish i prepare thanks to the numerous flavor options at my disposal my favorite pairing consists of the garlicinfused hummus along with the beetflavored variety additionally i utilize the remaining variations as a means to enrich the taste of my culinary creations its exquisite flavor satisfies my palate completely
the flavor profile of this particular cuisine was a complete letdown far from what i anticipated or enjoyed before

this place holds a special place in my heart ive frequented it for several years now honing my skills to prepare their famous smash dish perfectly they constantly innovate their menu offering a plethora of new choices that are always prepared with utmost freshness and exquisite flavors the waiting times are impressively short thanks to the efficient service the management and staff never fail to delight with their warm and affable nature
real good foodworth the price
there was a time when these gentlemen excelled greatly but things have since changed it would be beneficial for you to explore different possibilities

noisy chicken special woefully under seasonedsince when is risotto crunchy  i wonder if the chef bothers to taste the food he is serving  would not return there are many far better options in the general vicinity

the outdoor seating experience during summer is pleasant and enjoyable with a unique atmosphere but unfortunately the coffee shop lacks internet access on weekends what year are we in although i comprehend the need for turnover this subpar internet connection is frustratingly unreliable even on weekdays

im new here and opted for a chicken schwarma wrap alongside some falafel while it didnt turn out to be the worst choice the lack of robust flavor in the chicken left me unimpressed regarding the falafel i cant claim expertise but its heavy usage of parsley led to a strong bitter and grassy note

ticket prices for watching g force in 3d at this venue amounted to 1050 the theater itself was sizable wellmaintained and boasted exceptional sound quality which left me feeling content moreover there is a food court right before you enter so remember to bring a large bag and buy your snacks or meals beforehand oh by the way did i mention that previously

am i the only person that constantly gets static electric shocks at costconncostco is pretty much the same where ever you go in the valleynnwhere are the vegetarian options  thats nice you can get a 20 pack of italian sausages but where is the multipack of tofu

the chicken shawarma with hummous falafel and salad was absolutely delicious the addition of a large fluffy piece of pita bread made the meal even better  it is a rare find as most pitas are typically hard and thin
the atmosphere appears exceptionally luxurious and irresistibly inviting yet the prices significantly outweigh the offerings here youll have to shell out 20 for just a single glass of wine

as a firsttimer i selected the chicken schwarma wrap and falafel while it wasnt the worst meal ive ever had the chickens flavor was underwhelming and failed to hook me in as far as the falafel goes im not an expert but the excessive amount of parsley gave it a distinct bitter and grassy taste
for the fourth time now i have been to this place and had a fantastic experience with their spray tan service i anticipate returning again in the near future
this place boasts an impressively upscale ambiance that effortlessly entices patrons but the exorbitant pricing makes it difficult to justify expect to spend a whopping 20 on a mere glass of wine

i am quite fond of this spot where i can indulge in tearing apart a delicious pizza just like they do it in italy the pizza itself was delightful devoid of any greasiness moreover the servers promptly refill the beverages nevertheless during my visit with a friend the atmosphere seemed rather dull despite its cleanliness i think they should add some vibrancy to liven up the experience

the wait for the food was quite lengthy and the taste didnt meet expectations the standout feature of the eatery was the expansive collection of united states art adorning the dining area which thoroughly delighted the children

without any prior booking i decided to visit this establishment and they were able to accommodate me however the rates were quite high and the quality of their nail work was not up to par despite receiving a discount through checkin i still ended up paying a total of 95
the thai cuisine experience was taken to a whole new level with the flawlessly prepared crispy duck and drunken noodles
while the cleanliness and appearance of this place were commendable the atmosphere felt somewhat dull during my visit with a friend  perhaps some vibrancy would enhance it

this is my initial visit and i decided to try the chicken schwarma wrap and falafel while it wasnt the absolute worst the chicken lacked sufficient flavor to capture my attention as for the falafel im no connoisseur but it had an overpowering taste of parsley which left a strong bitter and grassy sensation
going back is not worthwhile due to its underwhelming and overpriced nature it did not live up to my expectations
the price wasnt justified and i have no desire to return as it was quite uneventful

the selfcheckout option in the clean store is an advantage although the pharmacy used to be open 24 hours until they discontinued that service consequently i shifted my shopping routine to a store located closer to me due to this change moreover there have been consistent issues with them not having my prescribed medications in stock which has been quite inconvenient additionally indulging in their fried chicken has become my guilty pleasure
this pizza left such an awful taste in my mouth making it the worst food ive ever consumed

what about having a sign displaying the operating hours there were people waiting for quite some time wouldnt it be helpful to have a digital sign indicating when youre open its a simple gesture of good customer service
the always available pizza wing special is exceptional

efforts were made twice to secure a table reservation at this particular venue in order to enjoy a satisfying dinner experience during our initial contact we were instructed to wait on the line for verification but instead left hanging indefinitely until we finally opted to disconnect in the subsequent trial there wasnt even a response from their end although the food here allegedly merits acclaim it is regrettable that i wont be supporting their business
can i classify this eatery as a fast food joint that ceases breakfast offerings by 10 in the morning
i have been to three smashburgers around az and this is by far the best one at least at this location there is consistency food is made well and warm it is a bit expensive but quite good i think

it was quite a wait for the food and unfortunately it lacked flavor however what truly stood out in the restaurant was the remarkable display of american artwork in the dining room much to the enjoyment of the kids

let me tell you about the most fantastic hummus ive ever tasted its so versatile that i use it in all sorts of meals thanks to its diverse range of flavors my absolute favorite combination is garlic hummus with a hint of beet hummus additionally adding other flavorpacked hummus varieties turns any dish into a culinary delight  utterly delicious

i have a strong affinity for innout however this specific establishment fails to meet expectations on one occasion the meal i received was served cold while the duration of my stay at the drivethru exceeded 20 minutes given that i had merely ordered a burger this lack of efficiency displayed by the staff is truly disheartening it is indispensable that they make improvements promptly

i was previously an ardent supporter of the wicked spoon but this buffet has surpassed it as my preferred option in las vegas all the offerings were excellent without any noticeable errors while certain selections were superior to others on the whole this buffet was truly impressive
indulge in the consistently fantastic pizza wing special
